data.title: London, Kiribati
data.meta_description: April weather for London, Kiribati: In April, in London, Kiribati, the rain falls for 22.1 days. In London, in April, the average water temperature is 27.8°C (82°F).
data.text:
Average high temperature in April: 27.4°C

The warmest month (with the highest average high temperature) is June (27.6°C).

The month with the lowest average high temperature is January (26.3°C).

Average low temperature in April: 26.2°C

The month with the highest average low temperature is May (26.5°C).

The coldest month (with the lowest average low temperature) is March (25.5°C).

Average sea temperature in April

London, Kiribati

Average sea temperature in April: 27.8°C

The best months for swimming (with the highest average sea temperature) are June and July (28.3°C).

The coldest months (with the lowest average sea temperature) are January and February (26.7°C).

Average daylight in April /

Average sunshine in April

London, Kiribati

Average daylight in April: 12h and 1min

The month with the longest days is June (Average daylight: 12h and 12min).

The month with the shortest days is December (Average daylight: 12h and 0min).

Average sunshine in April: 7h and 2min

The month with the most sunshine is July (Average sunshine: 7h and 54min).

The month with the least sunshine is February (Average sunshine: 6h and 30min).

Average sunshine days in April

London, Kiribati

Average sunshine days in April: 5.4 days

The month with the most sunshine days is October (16.9 days).

The months with the least sunshine days are March and April (5.4 days).

Average UV index in April

London, Kiribati

Average UV index in April: 7

The months with the highest UV index are January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October and November (UV index 7).

The month with the lowest UV index is December (UV index 6).

Average visibility in April

London, Kiribati

Average visibility in April: 10km

The months with the highest visibility are January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November and December (10km).

The months with the lowest visibility are January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November and December (10km).
